articles.title: Microsoft hosts emergency press conference after protesters 'storm a building'
articles.description: Microsoft president Brad Smith hosted an impromptu press conference on Tuesday afternoon, just hours after protesters gained access to a building at the companyâ€™s headquarters and held a sit-in demonstration inside his office. Seated on the edge of his desk, in the office that had been occupied by protesters earlier that day, Smith addressed a […]
articles.author: Jacob Kastrenakes
